## Cisco-IOS-XR-aaa-ldapd-cfg.yang

- [XPaths Obsoleted](#xpaths-obsoleted)

### Description

Removed 'bind-password, vrf, search-timeout, connect-timeout, bind-timeout, bind-dn' from container aaa-ldap.

N/A
